name: Log - quick story
description:
Log - quick story is game about saving our father from bad machine from sawmill.

If you are beginner play calmly and not pay attention to time. Just focus to finish all task.

Tips:
// Always look on your temperature and humidity level if any of them reach minimum or maximum valuable your character will die
// Your humidity depends on your temperature.
// Jump into water to reduce or stay near fire to rise your temperature

Good Luck
